short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter the world of intense action and stealth with Sekiro Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the fearless Shinobi, Sekiro, in stunning detail, this extension brings the atmosphere of feudal Japan and samurai combat to your new tab. Quickly access favorite websites, add custom links, and stay on top of your schedule with the built-in calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Watch Sekiro in action, immersed in his world of samurai and shadows.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Easily access frequently visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with your favorite links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of dates and time with a built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web effortlessly with your default engine.
Discover more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
